str2: Probably another form of biazo; to squeeze, i.e. Seize (press), or officially (arrest), or in hunting (capture).

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

From pseudes and prophetes; a spurious prophet, i.e. Pretended foreteller or religious impostor.

str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: Who, which, what, that.

str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.

Two. A primary numeral; 'two'.

str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.

str2: To ignite, light, burn, lit. and met; I consume with fire. Apparently a primary verb; to set on fire, i.e. Kindle or consume.
